main event: An unidentified object was observed hovering at high altitude, appearing round and orange-red in color before turning bright white while moving away.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes,Visibility was obstructed by morning haze,Several people reportedly witnessed the object during its visibility,There are no radar trackings or confirming data for the sighting,The possibility of the object being a high altitude balloon or natural phenomenon has not been ruled out.
sighted object: round, orange-red object that turned bright white
witness description: Several other people reportedly observed the object
